while-loop_key2: Aap pehle iss video ko dekhein `while` program ka dry run samajhne ke liye.
while-loop_key3: While `loop` kya hota hai yeh samajhne ke liye aap yeh dono videos dekh sakte ho.
while-loop_key4: yeh `loop` hai is mei hum `loop` kise kam kar raha hai voh hum dry run kar ke dekhna hai
while-loop_key5: Ab aap yeh questions solve karein.
while-loop_key6: `while` ke saath `else` ka bhi use ho sakta hai. Jab `while` `loop` khatam ho jata hai, toh `else` wala `code` `execute` hota hai. Yeh trick kaafi baar useful hoti hai.
